TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Schema content without effective date time start or end.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability to process MIP4 payloads without effective date time start or end, indicating if the content is applicable or not to the Current Situation.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer receives MIP4 schema without effective date time start or end and processes it into their system.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S, File
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Validated means to acquire information from the Producer using a MIP4 exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The consumer can process MIP4 schema without effective date time start or end.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Consumer successfully acquires content from the Producer and is able to apply it to their system without error.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain a MIP4 schema without effective date time start or end, from the producer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content will be received from the Producer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Process all the MIP4 content on the Consumer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Consumer will successfully process the MIP4 content without error, and indicates if it is applicable or not to the Current Situation.
